SEARCH

Uses of Class
com.ferrumx.exceptions.ShellException

Packages that use ShellException
Package
Description
com.ferrumx.formatter.cim
This package contains classes that capture the output provided by WMI classes and handle some potential exceptions that may occur during parsing of the output
com.ferrumx.system.associatedclasses
This package contains those classes which serve as a bridge/link between two Win32_Classes These have their own special output formats, so the Standard Formatters com.ferrumx.formatter.cim would not work.
com.ferrumx.system.hardware
This package contains classes that help fetch Hardware Information
com.ferrumx.system.networking
This package contains classes which help fetch network info not available in Win32_NetworkAdapter
com.ferrumx.system.operating_system
This package contains classes that help fetch OS info and Time-Zone

    Methods in com.ferrumx.formatter.cim that throw ShellException
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Map<String,String>
    CIM_ML.get(String win32Class, String attributes)
    Internally runs the command "Get-CimInstance -ClassName win32Class | Select-Object attributes | Format-List where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
    static String
    CIM_SL.get(String WMI_Class, String WMI_Attribute)
    Internally runs the command "Get-CimInstance -ClassName WMI_Class | Select-Object WMI_Attribute | Format-List where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
    static List<String>
    CIM_ML.getID(String win32Class, String Key)
    Internally runs the command "Get-CimInstance -ClassName win32Class | Select-Object Key | Format-List where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
    static List<String>
    CIM_ML.getIDWhere(String win32Class, String determinantProperty, String determinantValue, String extractProperty)
    Internally runs the command "Get-CimInstance -ClassName win32Class | Where-Object {$_.determinantProperty -eq determinantValue} | Select-Object extractProperty | Format-List where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
    static Map<String,String>
    CIM_ML.getWhere(String win32Class, String determinantProperty, String determinantValue, String attributes)
    Internally runs the command "Get-CimInstance -ClassName win32Class | Where-Object {$_.determinantProperty -eq determinantValue} | Select-Object extractProperty | Format-List where the parameters are provided by the calling methods
    static String
    CIM_SL.getWhere(String WMI_Class, String determinantProperty, String determinantValue, String WMI_Attribute)
    Internally runs the command "Get-CimInstance -ClassName WMI_Class | Where-Object whereCondition |Select-Object WMI_Attribute | Format-List where the parameters are provided by the calling methods

    Gathers the port details based on the given port ID

    Win32_Battery.getBattery()
    This method calls the CIM_ML.get(String, String) function and passes the WMI Classname and the properties whose values we want to fetch, as parameters

    static Map<String,String>
    Win32_DiskDrive.getDrive(String driveID)
    Fetches the Disk Details whose IDs were fetched using the Win32_DiskDrive.getDriveID() method
    static List<String>
    Win32_DiskDrive.getDriveID()
    Fetches a list of Disk Drives based on their DeviceID property This method internally calls CIM_ML.get(String, String) and passes the classname and the attributes mentioned in the class description as parameters
    static Map<String,String>
    Win32_VideoController.getGPU(String gpuID)
    This method fetches a list of GPUs found in the system, based on their IDs
    static List<String>
    Win32_VideoController.getGPUID()
    This method fetches a list of GPU IDs found in the system
    static Map<String,String>
    Win32_PhysicalMemory.getMemory(String memoryID)
    Fetches the properties mentioned in the class description based on the current memory stick Tag passed onto it

    static Map<String,String>
    Win32_BIOS.getPrimaryBIOS()
    Fetches Primary BIOS Information (If your motherboard has multiple BIOSes, the Main BIOS information will always be fetched).

    static List<String>
